players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is dead, and I'm shocked. What could have happened to him?"
You: "I have discovered that Charlie is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, I swear. I didn't kill Bob."
Diana: "I'm still trying to figure out what happened to Bob. I haven't made any accusations yet, but I will keep an eye on Charlie since Alice has suspicions about him."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
